name: Water Canyon (High Spur)
description:
Introduction

R1 55' tree up L Short slot

R2 80' deadman/"arch" up L (not good for sandtrap) 2 stage

Opens (can escape) 8' DC, 10' DC, opens (can escape) Stemming or squeezing to 5' awkward DC or assist More stemming/squeezing to 10' rap/DC/handline/assist

R3 3 stage 80' from 2 bolts- 1st stage jump over pothole on rappel, can DC 2nd stage

Squeezing and pretty light spot 15+min sand slog to conf-

Exit up L 100' from conf BEFORE rap into last narrows (not worth it)

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

  • Climb-Utah.com : Water Canyon
  • Super Amazing Map : Water Canyon (Roost)
